<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift if the lower 16-bit is cleared.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(Imm &amp; 0xffff)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  GetInstSeqLsADDiu(Imm, RemSize, SeqLs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If bit 15 is cleared, it doesn&#39;t make a difference whether the last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction is an ADDiu or ORi. In that case, do not call GetInstSeqLsORi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x8000) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstSeqLs SeqLsORi;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SeqLs.append(std::make&#95;move&#95;iterator(SeqLsORi.begin()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 std::make&#95;move&#95;iterator(SeqLsORi.end()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace a ADDiu &amp; SLL pair with a LUi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g. the following two instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ADDiu 273</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  SLL 18</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are replaced with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  LUi 1092</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MipsAnalyzeImmediate::ReplaceADDiuSLLWithLUi(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipsanalyzeimmediate/#a950c182688461d603b8950f9041b5385">InstSeq</a> &amp;Seq) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the first two instructions are ADDiu and SLL and the shift amount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is at least 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Seq.size() &lt; 2) || (Seq&#91;0&#93;.Opc != ADDiu) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (Seq&#91;1&#93;.Opc != SLL) || (Seq&#91;1&#93;.ImmOpnd &lt; 16))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sign-extend and shift operand of ADDiu and see if it still fits in 16-bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a4554b8c1e903115f6d7c75b0cc8900dcae71a5bce3c21304da97e1e5d3dab0ed3">Imm</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12a58d7f81a304e0c568ad2210bc4fe">SignExtend64&lt;16&gt;</a>(Seq&#91;0&#93;.ImmOpnd);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t ShiftedImm = (uint64&#95;t)Imm &lt;&lt; (Seq&#91;1&#93;.ImmOpnd - 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(ShiftedImm))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace the first instruction and erase the second.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Seq&#91;0&#93;.Opc = LUi;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Seq&#91;0&#93;.ImmOpnd = (unsigned)(ShiftedImm &amp; 0xffff);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Seq.erase(Seq.begin() + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MipsAnalyzeImmediate::GetShortestSeq(InstSeqLs &amp;SeqLs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipsanalyzeimmediate/#a950c182688461d603b8950f9041b5385">InstSeq</a> &amp;Insts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a9eae7ba1448d9866beca95a042de2e11">InstSeqLs::iterator</a> ShortestSeq = SeqLs.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The length of an instruction sequence is at most 7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShortestLength = 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a9eae7ba1448d9866beca95a042de2e11">InstSeqLs::iterator</a> S = SeqLs.begin(); S != SeqLs.end(); ++S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ReplaceADDiuSLLWithLUi(&#42;S);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(S-&gt;size() &lt;= 7);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (S-&gt;size() &lt; ShortestLength) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShortestSeq = S;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShortestLength = S-&gt;size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Insts.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Insts.append(ShortestSeq-&gt;begin(), ShortestSeq-&gt;end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
